days.label: Day 1 — Discover

drills.prompt: Coach me through a 60-second gentle hum with cues every 10 seconds. Focus on relaxed jaw and chest resonance. Start with a 5-second arrival.
Guide 5 cycles of nasal inhale, 'mmm' exhale with a 1:2 inhale:exhale ratio. Keep instructions minimal and calm.

drills.text: One-line note: where does my voice live today?
drills.prompt: Compress my felt sensation into one 12-word line for my Jar log.

days.checkpoint_prompt: Ask me 3 yes/no cues to confirm no throat strain and steady pulse; if not, provide a 60s remedial soft-hum drill.

days.label: Day 2 — Control

drills.prompt: Run a 5-round contrast practice: 6 seconds soft hum, 6 seconds slightly stronger, with reminders to avoid strain.

drills.text: Read aloud 2 minutes with steady breath.
drills.prompt: Give a 10-second posture setup, 10-second breath setup, then quiet 20-second checkpoints during a 2-minute read-aloud to relax shoulders and jaw.

drills.text: Warm water; jaw/neck stretch every 3 hours.
drills.prompt: Give a 30-second jaw/neck release routine I can repeat every 3 hours.

days.mix_prompt: I’m layering hums at 110/220/165 Hz (A2→A3→E3) under a track in key A (≈96 BPM). Suggest starting gains (0–1), which partials to keep/drop, and how to avoid clashes.

days.label: Day 3 — Integrate

drills.text: Posture + breath + steady tone; speak one calm truth.
drills.prompt: Guide a 90-second integration: stance, 1:2 breath, steady tone, then one calm sentence. Keep it grounded.
Give a 4-point listening checklist (tone, breath noise, jaw tension, pace) and a 45-second remedial if one item fails.
Lead a 60-second quiet scan to feel residual vibration; then produce one 10-word summary line.

days.checkpoint_prompt: Evaluate readiness: ask for calm-count pulse before/after 30s hum; if delta ≤3 BPM and no throat strain, suggest a 12-word Jar badge line.

global_prompts.jar_badge: Write a 12-word status for Jar Oct 18 badge based on my checkpoint result. Tone: steady, non-hype.
global_prompts.tunes_mix: I need a minimal plan to blend hums with a pop track in key A without clashes; give 5 bullet rules.
global_prompts.code_helper: Provide a minimal vanilla JS audio mixer for 3 looped WAVs + blend slider vs <audio>, single file, no console logs.
